txt.en: Fended off a White Hand attacker ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Help Thrymm fend off the White Hand attackers along the path leading to the Mead Hall.
Grimgar and his brother, Humbald have kept this area of Scylfig well-defended
The giant, Núrzum has breached the gate and is now heading towards the Mead Hall. It needs to be defended at all costs.
Fended off a White Hand attacker ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
More White Hand attackers rush forth to oppose you!
The strange giant felled Grimgar and Humbald in a single blow

Do not allow anything to get past you to the Mead Hall.
Núrzum's might easily overcomes Garsig and Cynegar

The giant Núrzum has tossed Thrymm quite a distance and it is unlikely that he survived the fall. Pleased with his work, the giant Núrzum departs Scylfig.

Stand beside Thrymm and guard the Mead Hall
The giant, Núrzum charges forth towards the Mead Hall and is met there by Thrymm Red-Beard. Observe the battle between the two warriors and ensure that no one gets into the Mead Hall.
The southern stables have been secured, but the giant Núrzum has breached the gate. Speak with Thrymm to find out what to do next.
After defeating Thrymm, Núrzum turns and departs Scylfig. The women and children inside the Mead Hall appear to be safe.
The giant Núrzum has tossed Thrymm quite a distance and it is unlikely that he survived the fall. Pleased with his work, the giant Núrzum departs Scylfig.
The White Hand have already penetrated the perimeter of Scylfig. Fend off the White Hand attackers near the front gate.

Speak with Thrymm on the road leading up to the Mead Hall
The giant, Núrzum, has hurled a gravely-wounded Thrymm far into the desolate lands of Wildermore, smothering hope and Scylfig beneath a harsh winter
Fend off the White Hand attackers near the front gate ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Thrymm in front of the Mead Hall
'I don't know what I'll do without them...'
Follow Thrymm to the northern stables
Cynegar and Garsig were the latest to perish at the hands of Núrzum.
Fend off the White Hand attackers at the northern stables ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Follow Thrymm to the centre of town
Fend off the White Hand attackers in the centre of town ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The giant Núrzum has tossed Thrymm quite a distance and it is unlikely that he survived the fall. Pleased with his work, the giant Núrzum departs Scylfig.
A giant has breached the gate to Scylfig and is charging forth into the centre of town.
Follow Thrymm to the Mead Hall
It appears that everyone inside the Mead Hall is safe and sound. They are relieved to hear the attack has ended.
Fend off the White Hand attackers along the path up to the Mead Hall ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Go to the Mead Hall and stand guard
You have located the villagers at the northern stables. Help them fend off the White Hand attackers.
Garsig and Cynegar are now trying to head Núrzum off at the road before he gets to the Mead Hall.
'We've experienced much grief today, [placeholder].'
You have located the villagers in the centre of town. Help them fend off the White Hand attackers.
You have located the villagers near the mead hall. Help them fend off the White Hand attackers.
Do not allow anything to get past you to the Mead Hall.
'[placeholder], we must hurry! The Orcs have penetrated the wall and are now attacking villagers. Follow me up to the northern stables!'
'My brother and I have this area well defended. We will not allow anything to get past us. Wait... do you hear that sound? What is that? The gate, the sound is coming from the front gate!'
'Good work so far, [placeholder]. Our work is far from done though. Let's head to the centre of town to cut off the Orcs before they head towards the Mead Hall.'
The giant, Núrzum charges forth towards the Mead Hall and is met there by Thrymm Red-Beard. Observe the battle between the two warriors and ensure that no one gets into the Mead Hall.
'This is not good. Grimgar and Humbald were defeated rather soundly by the giant. We must not let their defeat be in vain. You and I need to go protect the Mead Hall at once!'
'[placeholder], we must protect the Mead Hall at all costs! Come with me!'

'[placeholder], whatever happens, you and Cyneberg must protect the Mead Hall. 

'Your assistance has proven valuable. Myself and all of Scylfig are thankful for your efforts.

'I must do this myself. You and Cyneberg must not intervene.'
Instance: Defence of Scylfig
The giant, Núrzum charges forth towards the Mead Hall and is met there by Thrymm Red-beard. Observe the battle between the two warriors and ensure that no one gets into the Mead Hall.
TBD
The northern stables have been secured. Speak with Thrymm to find out where to head next.

The attack the people of Scylfig feared is now upon the town. Villagers throughout Scylfig need protection from the White Hand, but ultimately, the Mead Hall must not be breached. Therein are the women and children of the town.
Observe the battle between Thrymm and Núrzum
